artist: Artist: Hank Artaud , et al.; Author: Sophie D. Lux; Publisher: Public Illumination Magazine, Castel Ritaldi, Italy
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text, designs, and photomechanical illustration of a smiley face mosaic printed in offset lithography on coated paper covers; 22 pp.
title: Doom & Gloom: Public Illumination Magazine, no. 55
